title.narrative: U4.01/09 B: Disposal concepts for radioactive waste in Ukraine

description.narrative: The overall objective of this sub-project is to ensure effective implementation of the State purpose-orientated environmental programme for radioactive waste management.

description.narrative: Reported results indicators by the European Commission ¿ International Cooperation and Development (DEVCO) may not represent the complete set of indicators monitored for the project. The results are reported using a contribution approach. This means that where a project has been financed by the EU jointly with other funders ¿ such as partner country governments or other donors ¿ the overall outputs of the collective effort are reported rather than outputs attributed to the share of funding provided by the EU. For higher levels of results, such as outcomes and impacts, the project will only have contributed to the overall effort.

target.value: Preliminary safety assessments for each of the identified disposal concepts performed.

comment.narrative: Preliminary safety assessments for each of the identified disposal concepts performed.

actual.value: The preliminary safety assessments for each of the identified disposal concepts were performed assuming generic geologic, hydrologic and geomorphologic site characteristics.
